mapper.insert: insert into TeacherResultFromStudent (teacher_id, teacher_name, course_id, course_name, average1, average2, average3, average4, average5, average6, total_average, academy, semester, ranking) values (#{teacherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{average1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{average2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{average3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{average4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{average5,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{average6,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalAverage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{academy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{semester,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ranking,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select teacher_id, teacher_name, course_id, course_name, average1, average2, average3, average4, average5, average6, total_average, academy, semester, ranking from TeacherResultFromStudent
mapper.update: update TeacherResultFromStudent set ranking=#{rank} where course_id=#{courseId}
